title: Enhancing the quality of mango juices through Lacticaseibacillus paracasei fermentation: unveiling aroma and taste characteristics.
abstract: Lacticaseibacillus paracasei, widely recognized for its safety, is frequently used as a starter culture in fermented foods. In the present study, the differences in the physicochemical properties, antioxidant activities, volatile compounds and non-volatile compounds of mango juice fermented with L. paracasei FJG2339 were evaluated.
journal: Journal of the science of food and agriculture
